issue.title: [Archery][DevTools] Allow extra message to be sent on chat report
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16488](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16488). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Allow some extra content to be configurable via CLI when sending a chat-report.

This will allow to slightly customize the message that is sent.
